titleStmt.title: Hugh Mosher Earmark in Portsmouth: a digital transcription

publicationStmt.p: Christopher A. Mosher, Shelton, CT, USA, 2018.

sourceDesc.bibl: Town of Portsmouth (Rhode Island, USA), Portsmouth Records, Portsmouth, Rhode Island, vol. 1 (1638–1700): 225; Town records, 1638–1850, FHL microfilm 945,382, DGS 7649106, item 1, image 136 of 586.

body.p:
Eare marke of Hugh Mosher his Cattell is
two hapenis before vpon the Right Eare and one hapeny
one the left Eare before of seuen yeares Standinge
and is Entred vpon Record this
19th of feburery 1667
or 68
By me Richard Bulgar
Towne Clarke
